answers.answer: Ugh I totally feel you. I could totally go for some spaghetti and meat sauce right now and it's 9am. I'm typing this from my bed LOL!

Lol I'm the same way ... l this hole weekend my son and his daughter went to grandparents houses they come back today and the hole weekend morning noon and night I just wanna eat Firehouse and Chipotle and Peanut butter cookies lol .. I woke him up at 4 in the morning saying I wanted Firehouse and he was like if I owed firehouse I'd get it but they are closed then there was a small pause and he was like wright the owner and tell em too make them 24 hrs lol ...
Lol. That's funny. It gets frustrating when you can't get what you want!

Cheese. Key lime pie. Pickled watermelon rind. Costco Red Velvet cake. Popsicles. Tomato Caprese Salad. Rootbeer floats. Birthday cake ice cream. Cucumbers. Bananas. Greek yogurt. Apples & chunky peanutbutter.
Milk! With everything. Tacos, pizza, spaghetti, blts, burgers, Chinese, EVERYTHING. It's so weird lol.
I deff have a craving for milk too. All the time no matter what time of day!!
Ice cream with dark chocolate shavings and caramel sauce. I am not allowed any due to diabetes. :/
Pizza and ice cold orange juice!

question: What do you crave? Im craving chocolate Cake so bad & can't get it right now. I hate craving things I can't get right this second!
title: Cravings ughh!!!!
